extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the WS_FTP Server is affected by verifying if the version is prior to 8.8.2.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability (version prior to 8.8.2)?
Is the Ad Hoc Transfer module in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Remove or Disable Ad Hoc Transfer Module
extracted_playbook.description: Follow Progress Software's instructions to remove or disable the Ad Hoc Transfer module if it is not in use.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to WS_FTP Server Version 8.8.2
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to version 8.8.2 of the WS_FTP Server using the full installer to remediate the vulnerabilities. Expect an outage during the upgrade process.

affected_products: WS_FTP Server: All versions prior to 8.8.2
